amendment.description: To ensure proper disposal of consumer information and records derived from consumer reports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2067 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2067 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S13889-13890; text:: CR S13889) To ensure proper disposal of consumer information and records derived from consumer reports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2067 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Nelson FL.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2067 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
